divs: sighting detailsi was driving (north) to orlando from kissimmee on john young pkwy. the date was 01\20\12 at about 12:45am. as i was driving, i saw decided to look upward and to the right (through my windshield) and i saw a small circle of light at nimbus cloud height zooming faster than a plane or a helicopter at that altitude (relative to its distance from me; from my experience). i only saw it for a second as it went right into a cloud and was not seen again. i was traveling at approximately 50 mph, the object was traveling faster than i at it's height.
Summary: yellow circle of light zoomed northward over Orlando, fl.
trends: There have been 112 other sightings in Orlando
There were no other sightings in Orlando on or around January 20th 2012
